datasets.title: Global tropical cyclone (wind speed) hazard
datasets.description: Datasets containing probabilistic analysis of tropical cyclone maximum wind speed (in m/s). Return periods are generated using the STORM datasets.
datasets.details: Return periods were empirically calculated using Weibull's plotting formula. The STORM_FIXED_RETURN_PERIOD dataset contains maximum wind speeds for a fixed set of return periods at 10 km resolution in every ocean basin.

referenced_by.name: Generation of a global synthetic tropical cyclone hazard dataset using STORM

resources.title: Global tropical cyclone wind speed maps by return period (historical 1979-2014)
resources.description: The GeoTIFFs provided in the original STORM datasets have been mosaicked into single files with global extent for each climate model/return period. STORM_FIXED_RETURN_PERIODS_{STORM_MODEL}_{STORM_RP}_YR_RP.tif

resources.title: Global tropical cyclone wind speed maps by return period (median projections 2015-2050)
resources.description: The GeoTIFFs provided in the original STORM datasets have been mosaicked into single files with global extent for each climate model/return period. STORM_FIXED_RETURN_PERIODS_{STORM_MODEL}_{STORM_RP}_YR_RP.tif
